per_frame_6=mv_g=.390+(((sin(time/7)*0.3)+0.5*0.5)*0.1);

per_pixel_1=//adv=min( (bass*bass*bass), 1);
per_pixel_2=//warp=1*((( atan(time/3) *0.5+0.5)*3)* (x*rad)*2 )+( (y*ang)*2 )*rad;
per_pixel_3=//warp=warp*adv;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=//dx=cos(y)*0.005*(rad+2)*treb ;
per_pixel_6=//dy=sin(x)*0.005*(rad+2)*treb
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=//Do people that don't do drugs make shit like this??
per_pixel_9=//flexi per vertex
per_pixel_10=cx1 = 0.5+sin(time*2.9618)*0.2;
per_pixel_11=cy1 = 0.5+cos(time*1.9618)*0.2;
per_pixel_12=dir = bass*2;
per_pixel_13=d = sqrt((x-cx1)*(x-cx1)+(y-cy1)*(y-cy1));
per_pixel_14=x1 = if( above(d,0.3),0,  sin(y-cy1)*0.05*dir);
per_pixel_15=y1 = if( above(d,0.3),0, -sin(x-cx1)*0.05*dir);
per_pixel_16=cx1 = 0.5+sin(time*2.618)*0.3;
per_pixel_17=cy1 = 0.5+cos(time*3.14)*0.3;
per_pixel_18=dir = -mid*2;
per_pixel_19=d = sqrt((x-cx1)*(x-cx1)+(y-cy1)*(y-cy1));
per_pixel_20=x2 = if( above(d,0.2),0,  sin(y-cy1)*0.05*dir);
per_pixel_21=y2 = if( above(d,0.2),0, -sin(x-cx1)*0.05*dir);
per_pixel_22=cx1 = 0.5+sin(-time*2.618)*0.4;
per_pixel_23=cy1 = 0.5+cos(-time*1.14)*0.4;
per_pixel_24=dir = treb*3;
per_pixel_25=d = sqrt((x-cx1)*(x-cx1)+(y-cy1)*(y-cy1));
per_pixel_26=x3 = if( above(d,0.1),0,  sin(y-cy1)*0.05*dir);
per_pixel_27=y3 = if( above(d,0.1),0, -sin(x-cx1)*0.05*dir);
per_pixel_28=dx = dx+x1+x2+x3;
per_pixel_29=dy = dy+y1+y2+y3;
per_pixel_30=
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`float corr = texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_3=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x-0.5,uv.y-0.5)*aspect.xy;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float3 noiseVal =lum (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, corr*uv*.02+ .1*rand_frame));
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 k1 = float2((uv.x), (uv.y));
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float3 ret1 = GetBlur1(uv) ;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`float3 crisp = tex2D(sampler_main,uv+
warp_13=`              .01*sin(uv*q23*20)+ret1*.02) + noiseVal/30;
warp_14=`    
warp_15=` ret = crisp -.03 - 0.1*pow(1-rad,8);
warp_16=`}
comp_1=`float3 Get1 (float2 uvi) {return lerp (GetPixel (uvi), GetBlur1(uvi), 0.4);}
comp_2=`
comp_3=`shader_body {
comp_4=`ret = saturate(2*Get1 (uv));
comp_5=`ret *= 1.5*normalize ((tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,(uv+q14/32)/12)) + 0);
comp_6=`ret *= (hue_shader)*2;
comp_7=`}
